title: 125A.78 ALTERNATIVE DELIVERY AID ADJUSTMENT.
text:
A district is eligible for an alternative delivery aid adjustment if the commissioner has approved the application of the district according to section 125A.50.
For the fiscal year after approval of a district's application, and thereafter, the special education aid under section 125A.76 must be computed based on activities defined as reimbursable under Department of Education rules for special education and nonspecial education students, and additional activities as detailed and approved by the commissioner.
Revenue under section 125A.76 shall be used to implement the approved program.
